name: Park Tool FR-8 Freewheel Remover
description: No need to Macgyver that freewheel off. Get the right tool for the job. This solid Freewheel Remover is made of heat-treated steel and has a 1-inch base to fit a wrench or bench vise.Has 4 notches approximately 25mm across measured inside to inside.Removes 4-notch freewheels from flip-flop BMX hubs with 30 x 1mm threads.
